name: Fantasy Grounds - Ravenlands Mega Bundle (Map Pack)
detailed_description:
Ravenlands Mega Bundle Map Pack

Map Pack

This product is an installable module containing maps and tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in your Token box for use throughout your game. The maps are available for use from your Maps and Images screen within FG and the map also comes with a short introductory story and links to the maps in various forms. Maps are provided without a grid and with both a hex grid and a square grid displayed. Some maps contain multiple views, such as one with exteriors of buildings shown and with some interiors of building shown.

This pack contains maps from the following Scrying Eye Games products:

  • Ravenlands 1: Castle Raven
  • Ravenlands 2: Battleground of Old
  • Ravenlands 3: River and Bridge
  • Ravenlands 4: River and Caves
  • Ravenlands 5: Sacred Grounds
  • Ravenlands 6: Town of Raventon
  • Ravenlands 7: The Ravenclaws Inn
  • Ravenlands 8: Mine and Quarry
  • Hexeiden Keep

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Released on March 19, 2010. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
